de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.model.interfaces

Interface ISemanticRelation<Target>

  • Type Parameters:
    Target - The class targeted by the relation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SemanticRelation, SenseRelation, SynsetRelation

    public interface ISemanticRelation<Target>
    ISemanticRelation is an interface for UBY-LMF class which represent a semantic relation.
    Author:
    Zijad Maksuti

    • Method Summary

      Methods
